txt.en:
'Though few believe it, I have been freed from the evil that once ensnared me. It was as the lifting of a veil and a release from chains that held me for so long. I am no longer consumed by the ring, Narchuil, nor the desire for it.

'I have dire news -- a warning for those that would listen: As Amarthiel, I had heard whispers of a hidden city of the Dúnedain, Esteldín. I had sent out a master spy to divine its location, and by now they surely must have located it. 

'The Rangers must be warned of this threat; if the spy is able to infiltrate Esteldín, they will move a large force against it in secret. Travel to the North Downs and warn the leader of this camp against the treachery that I have sown.'

<rgb=#FF0000>You will automatically travel to Esteldín in the North Downs when you accept this quest.</rgb>
'What brings you to Esteldín this day, [placeholder]?'
'I know only that Esteldín lies somewhere in the North Downs.'
Book 15, Chapter 2: A Threat to the Dúnedain
'You must hurry. Esteldín has not the time for delay.'
Narmeleth has turned from her evil ways and has offered her knowledge in aid of the Free Peoples.
Esteldín is in the North Downs, a land north-west of the Trollshaws.\n\nNarmeleth wishes for you to travel to Esteldín and warn Halbarad of the spy.
